name: Alphornkriege
description:
Welcome to the Alp!

Alphornkriege is a completely free local multiplayer game.

How to play: 
You need to push 6 opposing rams or their king off the Alp.
Your rams run until they hit someone or to the edge of the alp.
Rams are pushed back further the more you are, so 4 rams against 2 means they will be pushed back to 2 fields.

Thank you for playing. This is our first release, We are really looking forward to some feedback.
